entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
